00027 template<typename T>
00028 inline void clearListList(T&obj)
00029 {
00030     typename T::iterator it = obj.begin();
00031     for ( ; it != obj.end() ; ++it){
00032         it->clear();
00033     }
00034     obj.clear();
00035 }
00036 
00037 template<typename T>
00038 inline void safe_delete(T& obj)
00039 {
00040         typename T::iterator it =obj.begin();
00041         for( ; it != obj.end() ; ++it ){
00042 //                cout << "call safe_delete" <<endl;
00043                 delete *it;
00044  //               cout << "called safe_delete" <<endl;
00045         }
00046   //      cout << "About to clear safedelete" <<endl;
00047         obj.clear();
00048   //      cout << "Cleared safedelete" <<endl;
00049 }
00050 
00051 }}
